title: Analysis of determinants in corporate restructuring capabilities: Socio-structural collaboration and learning strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of organizational management and corporate strategy, foundational sociostructural analysis, and basic data analysis competencies
context.additional_context: Learners design and analyze surveys in BYOD environments, exploring reconstruction strategies considering economic/political contexts using real corporate case data.

learning_goals: Empirically analyze how internal/external organizational collaborations (with partners, departments, teams) impact the formation and restructuring of social capital in enterprises.
Evaluate how individual, group, and organizational learning strategies influence knowledge recombination capabilities and organizational culture change.
Statistically process survey-based data to derive determinants of restructuring capabilities and institutional environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
